attributes.action: Explain why the government adds so much duty to fuel costs
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Headline from the States about fuel costs reaching $2.60 per gallon when we are approaching that much per litre - due almost entirely to the amount of duty the government extort. It seems entirely unreasonable given the high level of road tax also paid that we pay so much duty.

rejection.details: Your title should be a clear call for action. Asking for an 'explanation' is not considered a valid action according to the terms and conditions.
reasons: Statements that don't actually request any action
